item.title: Film Movement Takes North American Distribution Rights for Cannes, Toronto Title ‘Renoir’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Film Movement has secured North American distribution rights to “Renoir,” the sophomore feature from Japanese filmmaker Chie Hayakawa that unspooled in competition at Cannes this year. The
